text: Nde guigira na phorgap Zisas khothɨgi gumgi gu mbigi, gu wo ndavar vhen, gu guigira nde khothɨgi, nde zazera tɨvir vhuuiaŋ mbuim, tɨvir vhuuiŋ guigira nden ki. Nde vhɨra mbarkɨrga ndɨkndɨgir vhuuiŋ ki. Maaŋ muuŋgiap, nde bevbevira, nde ndɨkndɨgi vhuuin harigi Fhe Bakɨmen gumgi gu mbigir nɨɨnga.
